attributes.action: Keep promotional models in a job
attributes.additional_details:
Feminists are campaigning against promotional models/ hostesses saying that we are “demeaning” and “uneducated”. What right does any woman have to get another woman sacked?? We are all human, we have our own rights and we should be free to do whatever job we wish to! 

Feminists are going against everything they stand for and attacking women because we have a glamourous job! It’s our choice!!

Let us put a stop to this before it goes further!! Keep promotional models and hostesses in a job!!
attributes.background:
With the recent ban on walk on girls at the PDC and F1. It is only a matter of time before this escalates further and it concerns me of the future for promotional models. 

We are self employed, we pay our taxes, we work hard. Let us keep our choice of job!!!

rejection.details: This is a decision made by employers, not an action that the UK Government and Parliament have taken.
